text_block_list.text:
Several days later, I was visiting the 
Hanshin racecourse to spectate. When-

text_block_list.name: Fine Motion
text_block_list.text:
No way, you're…! 
Waaa, that badge, so you're one of the school's trainers!

text_block_list.name: Fine Motion
text_block_list.text:
Ahahaa, "Your Highness" isn't needed! I'm Fine Motion, how do you 
do? Thank you very much for your help the other day!

text_block_list.name: Fine Motion
text_block_list.text:
What a coincidence, are you watching the races too? …Oh, 
that's right, this is also an important part of being a trainer!

text_block_list.name: Fine Motion
text_block_list.text: For me, too, today is - important as a spectator.

text_block_list.name: Fine Motion
text_block_list.text:
If it's fine with you, let's head this way! Actually, I woke up 
super early and got a good spot. Let's watch together!
(WHOOOOOOOAAA!)

text_block_list.name: Commentator
text_block_list.text:
They've entered the opposite straight, #1 in popularity, 
T.M. Opera O, in the middle! Air Shakur is in the 
back of the pack, and moves forward!

text_block_list.name: Air Shakur
text_block_list.text: Heh…just watch…!

text_block_list.name: Fine Motion
text_block_list.text: Shakur! Do your best!

Fine Motion was eagerly giving her all, frantically jumping up 
and down as she cheered Air Shakur on.

text_block_list.name: Fine Motion
text_block_list.text:
Shakur is a wonderful Uma Musume, you know? She's very 
clever…but tactless and will never give up on victory!

text_block_list.name: Commentator
text_block_list.text:
They round the 4th corner, finally reaching the final 
straight! Coming from the outside is #1 in popularity, 
T.M. Opera O! Will she pull through!?

text_block_list.name: Fine Motion
text_block_list.text:
No…! Make sure you get a good look! 
From here on, this is Shakur's spirit!

text_block_list.name: Air Shakur
text_block_list.text: ORAAAAAAA!!!

text_block_list.name: Commentator
text_block_list.text:
Air Shakur! Air Shakur pulls forward! 
Subtly and steadily, Air Shakur pushes forward! First place is-

text_block_list.name: Fine Motion
text_block_list.text: Shakur…!
At that moment - I casually look to my side and realize.
(WHOOOOOOOOOA!)

text_block_list.name: Fine Motion
text_block_list.text:
Good work, Shakur! That last straight…that was an amazing 
drive. My heart is still racing!

text_block_list.name: Air Shakur
text_block_list.text: Tch… it only got me second, so it was pointless.

text_block_list.name: Fine Motion
text_block_list.text:
That's true, for you it might have left you dissatisfied…but 
for me it was definitely, a heart-racing, magnificent run.

text_block_list.name: Fine Motion
text_block_list.text:
All the things you've built up, one by one, every 
single one of those things dazzlingly shines through… 
it's unspeakably wonderful.

text_block_list.name: Fine Motion
text_block_list.text:
-Today also, will become a very important memory for me. 
Thank you, Shakur!

text_block_list.name: Air Shakur
text_block_list.text: …yeah, sure.

After all was said and done, I escorted Fine Motion back to 
school just in case- She was in high spirits the entire time.

text_block_list.name: Fine Motion
text_block_list.text:
Aaah, races are awesome! Shakur is awesome too! 
You saw it right? That thrilling last drive in the end!

text_block_list.name: Fine Motion
text_block_list.text:
I want to keep reliving that experience! 
At the start, like this, running while holding back-!

text_block_list.name: SP Commander
text_block_list.text: Ah, Your Highness!? Please wait-!

text_block_list.name: Fine Motion
text_block_list.text:
Haa, haa, haa… not yet, not yet! 
Save your strength, and then…!

I was surprised when she suddenly took off but… more so than 
that, she displayed an unexpectedly splendid running form!

Her form is a little rough, but on the other hand there seems to 
be some potential…And, maybe even more than that.

text_block_list.name: Fine Motion
text_block_list.text:
Haa, haa, and here…! 
Last, Spurt! Yaaaaaaaaa!!

I can't pull my gaze away from Fine Motion's eyes. 
It's just that… she's-
-having so much fun.

text_block_list.name: SP Commander
text_block_list.text:
Your Highness…! I-is something the matter?! 
Have you forgotten that sprinting at full 
speed has been strictly forbidden?!

text_block_list.name: Fine Motion
text_block_list.text:
Eh?…Ah! I'm deeply sorry! 
I… couldn't help myself.

text_block_list.name: Fine Motion
text_block_list.text: Ahaha… yeah, that's how it is.

text_block_list.name: Fine Motion
text_block_list.text:
From the start "Absolute Safety" was a condition of studying 
abroad. Things where there's a risk of getting hurt… and 
running in races, all of those are forbidden.

text_block_list.name: Fine Motion
text_block_list.text: -But, I absolutely wanted to come to Tracen Academy for myself!

text_block_list.name: Fine Motion
text_block_list.text:
I wanted to be friends with, and speak with… all those girls 
around my age that were giving their all to chase their dreams.

text_block_list.name: Fine Motion
text_block_list.text:
Things like that, will become my treasure… It will become an 
important experience, with regards to fulfilling my duty.

The weight of the words she casually spoke, unconsciously gave me 
pause. This amiable, innocent girl…she's still-

A member of the Royal Family, saddled with 
a heavy duty to bear from birth.

text_block_list.name: Fine Motion
text_block_list.text:
Fufuu, I'm glad Japan is such a safe place! 
It probably played a big part in persuading my father and family.

text_block_list.name: Fine Motion
text_block_list.text:
I made friends, got to go to the stores I wanted to, and even got 
to spectate a few races at such a good place.

text_block_list.name: Fine Motion
text_block_list.text: -I can return home, fully satisfied!
That was the word that unconsciously came out of my mouth.

text_block_list.name: Fine Motion
text_block_list.text: …eh?

She laughed, saying she was fully satisfied. Just 
being able to come to the academy, just making friends, 
even though she couldn't run. But-
choice_data_list: Really, you're satisfied with only that…?
Really, you're satisfied with only that…?

text_block_list.text:
Even though she said all that while laughing, 
her eyes weren't sparkling like before.

text_block_list.name: Fine Motion
text_block_list.text: Um… I-

text_block_list.name: SP Commander
text_block_list.text:
…Your Highness, you will catch a cold out here. 
Please return to your dorm.

In the end, her guard cut our conversation short so I couldn't 
speak with her more than that. But…somewhere in my heart, I 
already had my answer.

text_block_list.name: Air Shakur
text_block_list.text: Hey…you got any idea what you're sticking your nose in to?

text_block_list.name: Air Shakur
text_block_list.text:
Don't 'Eh' me with that stupid look on your face! 
…Ah, damnit.

text_block_list.name: Air Shakur
text_block_list.text: -Don't even try to help with such half-hearted resolve.
That warning, sharply pierced my heart.
